import React from 'react'; import { withStyles,Avatar,Typography,InputBase } from '@material-ui/core'; import { MoreVert,Telegram,PermMedia,EmojiEmotions,Close,Videocam,PhotoCamera, } from '@material-ui/icons'; const useStyles = theme => ({ container:{ width: '400px', height: '450px', position: 'fixed', bottom:0, right: '30px', zIndex:2, }, contItemBottom:{ width: '100%', height: '80%', backgroundColor: 'lightgrey', overflowY: 'auto', }, itemTop:{ width: '100%', height: '10%', backgroundColor: 'dimgrey', borderTopLeftRadius: theme.spacing(2), borderTopRightRadius: theme.spacing(2), alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'space-between', display: 'flex', textTransform: 'capitalize', color: "#ececec", fontSize: "20px", fontWeight: 500, }, message:{ display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', padding: '10px', textTransform: 'capitalize', }, messageOwn:{ display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', alignItems: 'flex-end', padding: '10px', textTransform: 'capitalize', }, inputCustom:{ width: '95%', height: '8%', textTransform: 'capitalize', backgroundColor: ' #909497', borderRadius: theme.spacing(3), display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', color: "#ececec", paddingLeft: '10px', paddingRight: '10px', }, input:{ color: "white", marginLeft: theme.spacing(1), width: "80%", }, contItem:{ width: "100%", height: "100%", border: "1px solid dimgrey", borderTopLeftRadius: theme.spacing(2), borderTopRightRadius: theme.spacing(2), }, }); export class BoxMessage extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props); }; render() { const { classes } = this.props; return (
orthencia

) } } export default withStyles(useStyles)(BoxMessage)
